name: Mens Ultra Soft - Om T-Shirt (Blue)
description:
Beautiful and bold Om logo.

::  take your practice to the next level. be inspired.  ::
_______________________________________________________

Inspirational print is on a soft, durable tee. 100% ring spun cotton.

So soft that you will want to wear it everyday!
_______________________________________________________

Hindus believe that as creation began, the divine, all-encompassing consciousness took the form of the first and original vibration manifesting as sound "OM".

A mystic syllable, considered the most sacred mantra.

The "OM" ancient syllable is the shortest of the Mantras and in Indian tradition. It is a word suggestive of God.
